eastroom.description: You've entered Ray's office. You are surrounded by a mess of Star Wars toys and other distractions. No wonder Ray never seems to get anything done.

initial.description:
You are in a rather simple room. Plain white walls surround you and nothing really
stands out of the ordinary. Despite that, you feel the pull of a new adventure and
steel yourself for what waits ahead!

westroom.description: This is a rather dramatic room, almost presidential you would say.
